name: Spur
headline: Spur is your AI QA Engineer. Test your websites with natural language.
description: Never code up another test or hire an external QA team. We handle and automate all functional and E2E testing.

founders.name: Sneha Sivakumar, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO at Spur. Previously, Growth Engineer at Figma and Snap.

founders.name: Anushka Nijhawan, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CTO at Spur. Previously @ Yale CS, Deepmind, and Meta.

# Yo
### Spur lets you test your website with Natural Language.
[Book a Demo](https://www.spurtest.com/<#book-a-demo>)[Sign Up](https://www.spurtest.com/<https:/tally.so/r/n9WR4Q>)
#### Backed by
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4b2f76b760921deb37b14_yc.png)](https://www.spurtest.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/677df61e6776d67bb5ba2d0f_first-round-primary-logo-blk.png)](https://www.spurtest.com/<https:/firstround.com/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/677df60e7108ec1ebad6af25_Pear_VC_logo.svg.png)](https://www.spurtest.com/<https:/pear.vc/>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/677e00d42a2ea7d002a540f3_neo.svg)](https://www.spurtest.com/<https:/neo.com/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66ca9bb672f1594d103b2484_Spir%20Webclip.png)
### Trusted by top companies
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/677deeab2d1d8a99efc1e0ec_terrakotta%20logo.png)
“I’m gonna see if I can expense Spur through my wellness stipend. Category: Therapy”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4e114ef6e91c5aa633fc7_Rectangle%201017.png)
Gabe Wilson
Founder @ Terrakotta
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/677decd7cf8addba7abfd717_figma%20logo.svg)
"Spur takes testing to the next level. I was mind blown when I saw it work, and how easy it was to set up tests just with natural language. "
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4e0fc20b0731e9a78c36b_Rectangle%201018.png)

Software Engineer @Figma
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/677dee0db3db477dc1c9d26c_Stack%20Logo.svg)
"We’ve been using Spur and it’s been AMAZING — unlike all the competitors that we’ve tried, they actually work! Can highly recommend."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4e106796e631cd8c71921_Rectangle%201016.png)
Konsti Wohlwend
Founder @ Stack
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/677def3b17fa0aacefdb97c6_Feasto.png)
"Spur has helped us improve our software testing process by over 60% & cut down the manual testing time by 40% in just three months. If you're a startup, investing in Spur early is a decision you won't regret."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4e122528f820e853f9b14_Rectangle%201021.png)
Naresh Shanmugaraj
Founder & CEO @ Feasto
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/679b1a1870c89dd0c59decfd_image%20\(3\).png)
"Spur has been critical in testing all of our AI features. It is super easy to spin these tests, and require very little maintenance on our part once setup."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/679b1a032e1c23283b6ee441_yusuf.png)
Yusuf Hilmi
Founder & CEO @Polymet
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/677defe106180dc1262fbbb3_Vecflow.svg)
"We had a HUGE ui revamp and are still able to test easily without needing maintenance, not a single test has broken due to flakiness. They mean it when they say their tests are reliable."

Founder & CTO VecFlow

## How it works
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4c48ff08a103431abd4e5_img1.png)
### Test your website with natural language
It takes minutes—not days—to spin up reliable automated tests. that test your site exactly as your users would use it
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4dbfc30842fcc7d13306c_Playback.gif)
### View video replays of the test runs and an in-depth analysis of each step
Watch Spur Agent in action, and see every move. Real-time playback and detailed analysis make debugging a breeze.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4d21344aa3cd1b05d085e_Webskte%20cnanges.gif)
### Make testing more reliable — even if your site changes
Spur tests are AI-powered. No CSS selectors, no maintenance headaches. Your tests adapt to UI changes automatically.
### Check out our launch
Check out what we've been building! After months of coding and testing, we're super excited to launch our AI QA tool that lets you test websites just by talking to it. No more complicated test scripts - just tell it what you want to check in plain English. Pretty cool, right?
> ✨[@spur_dev](https://www.spurtest.com/<https:/twitter.com/spur_dev?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw>) (YC S24) is building an AI QA Engineer that helps users test their websites with natural language.Congrats on the launch, [@sneha8sivakumar](https://www.spurtest.com/<https:/twitter.com/sneha8sivakumar?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw>) and Anushka!<https://t.co/XxgT4lU9vv> [pic.twitter.com/1he1RF9K3U](https://www.spurtest.com/<https:/t.co/1he1RF9K3U>)
> — Y Combinator (@ycombinator) [August 20, 2024](https://www.spurtest.com/<https:/twitter.com/ycombinator/status/1825974215796744506?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw>)
## Learn more, today.
[Book a Demo](https://www.spurtest.com/<#book-a-demo>)[Sign Up](https://www.spurtest.com/<https:/tally.so/r/n9WR4Q>)
## Each feature customized to your team’s needs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4bc1d8f70e9283c3f2f02_Helping%20Hand.svg)
### Flakiness Reduced
Focusing on the logic. Our AI models do not rely on XPath or CSS selectors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4bc9128ee13ba75b4c09f_Language.svg)
### Easily write tests in natural language
Write automated tests in a fraction of the time, and spin up tests in minutes — not hours.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4bc91d5d9613629d2c32e_Medal.svg)
### Powerful Validations
Craft powerful validations from any logical statement or visual condition
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4bc915bdc459505d90deb_Secure.svg)
### Keep your codebase secure
Only require your public URL. No exposure to codebase or proprietary data required.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4bc916a4f6d071edf8334_Popular%20Man.svg)
### Test actual User Experience
Test your site just as your users use it. The Spur Agent is built to replicate actual user behavior.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4bc91fb552663cdbbb51a_Query%20Inner%20Join.svg)
### Integrated with CI/CD
Simple integration with your CI/CD pipelines.
## Frequently Asked Questions
We’re here to help. If you have questions, we’re here to answer them.
[Book a Demo](https://www.spurtest.com/<#book-a-demo>)
What is the onboarding process?
Onboarding is extremely simple on Spur — since we do not require access to your codebase, all you need to provide is a public URL to start writing your first test.We onboard customers in two steps: first, hop on a [call](https://www.spurtest.com/<#book-a-demo>) with us to help us understand your requirements, and we'll onboard you on the next call and get you set up in no time!
How does the Spur Agent work?
The Spur Agent is a **vision-first** , multi-modal agent. This means that your tests are not reliant on CSS selectors, unlike tests written in web-automation frameworks like Playwright or Selenium. This allows your tests to be more reliable, and reduces the chances of false-positives — so you can focus on shipping faster!
What kind of flows do you support?
We can support any action that happens within the Browser window—no matter how complex your use case is. The Spur Agent interacts with the browser just like any human does! 
Do I need to know how to code to use Spur?
No! Spur is a no-code test platform — this means that all tests can be written in Natural Language. Whether you are a PM, CTO, Engineer or QA — anyone can write tests on Spur.
Can we test APIs through Spur?
Yes! We have API testing support for tests! You can call, store, and verify the response of any APIs in Spur — including ones that are dynamically generated. 
## Book a demo to learn more about Spur
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4be7708e9427c1db39dfc_Footer%20Logo.png)](https://www.spurtest.com/<#home>)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/676fa083f0c1ff125d59a7dd_download%20\(1\).svg)
## How it works
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4c48ff08a103431abd4e5_img1.png)
### Test your website with natural language
It takes minutes—not days—to spin up reliable automated tests. that test your site exactly as your users would use it
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4dbfc30842fcc7d13306c_Playback.gif)
### View video replays of the test runs and an in-depth analysis of each step
Watch Spur Agent in action, and see every move. Real-time playback and detailed analysis make debugging a breeze.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4d21344aa3cd1b05d085e_Webskte%20cnanges.gif)
### Make testing more reliable — even if your site changes
Spur tests are AI-powered. No CSS selectors, no maintenance headaches. Your tests adapt to UI changes automatically.
### Check out our launch
Check out what we've been building! After months of coding and testing, we're super excited to launch our AI QA tool that lets you test websites just by talking to it. No more complicated test scripts - just tell it what you want to check in plain English. Pretty cool, right?
> ✨@spur_dev⟨12⟩ (YC S24) is building an AI QA Engineer that helps users test their websites with natural language.Congrats on the launch, @sneha8sivakumar⟨13⟩ and Anushka!<https://t.co/XxgT4lU9vv> pic.twitter.com/1he1RF9K3U⟨14⟩
> — Y Combinator (@ycombinator) August 20, 2024⟨15⟩
## Learn more, today.
Book a Demo⟨6⟩Sign Up⟨7⟩
## Each feature customized to your team’s needs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4bc1d8f70e9283c3f2f02_Helping%20Hand.svg)
### Flakiness Reduced
Focusing on the logic. Our AI models do not rely on XPath or CSS selectors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4bc9128ee13ba75b4c09f_Language.svg)
### Easily write tests in natural language
Write automated tests in a fraction of the time, and spin up tests in minutes — not hours.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4bc91d5d9613629d2c32e_Medal.svg)
### Powerful Validations
Craft powerful validations from any logical statement or visual condition
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4bc915bdc459505d90deb_Secure.svg)
### Keep your codebase secure
Only require your public URL. No exposure to codebase or proprietary data required.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4bc916a4f6d071edf8334_Popular%20Man.svg)
### Test actual User Experience
Test your site just as your users use it. The Spur Agent is built to replicate actual user behavior.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c3e4ffe16480b253b3458d/66c4bc91fb552663cdbbb51a_Query%20Inner%20Join.svg)
### Integrated with CI/CD
Simple integration with your CI/CD pipelines.
## Frequently Asked Questions
We’re here to help. If you have questions, we’re here to answer them.
Book a Demo⟨6⟩
What is the onboarding process?
Onboarding is extremely simple on Spur — since we do not require access to your codebase, all you need to provide is a public URL to start writing your first test.We onboard customers in two steps: first, hop on a call⟨6⟩ with us to help us understand your requirements, and we'll onboard you on the next call and get you set up in no time!
How does the Spur Agent work?
The Spur Agent is a **vision-first** , multi-modal agent. This means that your tests are not reliant on CSS selectors, unlike tests written in web-automation frameworks like Playwright or Selenium. This allows your tests to be more reliable, and reduces the chances of false-positives — so you can focus on shipping faster!
What kind of flows do you support?
We can support any action that happens within the Browser window—no matter how complex your use case is. The Spur Agent interacts with the browser just like any human does! 
Do I need to know how to code to use Spur?
No! Spur is a no-code test platform — this means that all tests can be written in Natural Language. Whether you are a PM, CTO, Engineer or QA — anyone can write tests on Spur.
Can we test APIs through Spur?
Yes! We have API testing support for tests! You can call, store, and verify the response of any APIs in Spur — including ones that are dynamically generated. 
## Book a demo to learn more about Spur
![⟨16⟩](https://www.spurtest.com/<#home>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Spur**

Founded in 2024 and hailing from Y Combinator Batch S24, Spur is transforming how businesses conduct quality assurance (QA) testing. Located in the heart of San Francisco, this ambitious startup operates with a lean team of just four employees. Their mission is simple yet profound: "Spur is your AI QA Engineer. Test your websites with natural language." 

The concept behind Spur is to streamline and automate the testing process, allowing users to generate tests effortlessly—no coding required. In essence, they eliminate the need for manual testing or hiring external QA teams.

**How It Works:**
Spur stands out because it uses natural language processing to create automated tests. Users can describe what they want to test, and Spur handles the technical intricacies. This AI-driven approach means tests adapt automatically to changes in a website's user interface. Forget about the days of wrestling with brittle CSS selectors! Spur significantly reduces maintenance overhead and truly democratizes testing, making it accessible to team members across all levels—from developers to product managers.

**Notable Achievements:**
Spur has already demonstrated its capabilities by helping clients like Wander.com increase their release velocity significantly—by up to 20 times! Testimonials from early adopters—including companies like Figma, Stack, and Polymet—indicate that they've achieved impressive efficiencies by integrating Spur into their workflows.

**Partnerships and Backing:**
Backed by notable investors like Jared Friedman and driven by its innovative tool, Spur has gained traction among tech-forward startups looking to optimize their testing processes. Their tool plays nicely within CI/CD pipelines, making it a go-to option for product teams keen on ensuring high-quality software.

**Why It Matters:**
With the tech landscape continuously evolving, manual testing can be an overwhelming bottleneck for startups and scale-ups alike. Spur is tackling this challenge head-on, offering a no-code solution that not only speeds up testing but also enhances reliability. 

In summary, Spur is making waves in the developer tools space by redefining how quality assurance can be conducted—efficiently, intuitively, and without the need for extensive technical skills. If you're in the market for an AI-powered, user-friendly testing solution, checking out their demo may be well worth your time. 

**Want to learn more?** Visit their website at [spurtest.com](https://www.spurtest.com/) to explore their offerings and book a demo.
